name: Brick Block Destroyer XP
description:
Welcome to Brick Block Destroyer XP, a three.js game made with the aesthetic of an old Windows XP screensaver. Destroy all the bricks in each stage to move onto the next one! Every level adds more brick blocks to destroy and makes the ball faster. Lose all of your lives and the level resets, using a Continue. Lose all of your continues and you go back to level 1. Can you reach level 100? Good luck!

Important Notes:

1. Hit 5 brick blocks in a row to gain an extra life (maximum of 4 total).

2. Beat a level without losing a single life and you gain continues equal to the level number (beat Level 1 and get 1 continue, beat Level 6 and get 6 continues, etc.).

3. Beating a level will reset your lives back to 4 every single time.
